## CrudConnector.findById() method

Find an entity by id

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findById?<IdType>(modelClass: Class<Entity>, id: IdType, options?: Options): Promise<EntityData>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  modelClass | [Class](./repository.class.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Entity](./repository.entity.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The model class |
|  id | IdType | The entity id value |
|  options | [Options](./repository.options.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Options for the operation |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[EntityData](./repository.entitydata.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A promise of the entity found for the id
